mapper.select: SELECT ts.site_id, ts.site_name, ts.lng, ts.lat, tv.hphm FROM t_violation tv LEFT JOIN t_camera tc ON tv.camera_id = tc.camera_id LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON tc.site_id = ts.site_id WHERE wzlx ='号牌异常' ORDER BY tv.create_time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT count(tv.violation_id) FROM t_violation tv LEFT JOIN t_camera tc ON tv.camera_id = tc.camera_id LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON tc.site_id = ts.site_id WHERE tv.hphm =#{hphm} AND ts.site_id =#{siteId} AND tv.wzlx ='号牌异常'

SELECT ts.site_id, ts.site_name, tv.hphm, tv.image_hash, js.occur_time FROM t_violation tv LEFT JOIN t_camera tc ON tv.camera_id = tc.camera_id LEFT JOIN t_site ts ON tc.site_id = ts.site_id LEFT JOIN ${tblName} js ON js.tvis_json_id = tv.tvis_json_id WHERE tv.wzlx ='号牌异常' ORDER BY tv.create_time DESC LIMIT 4
